WorkPlace.Name: HOLISTIC BODY CARE ApS
WorkPlace.OrganizationDescription:
Beauty Avenue always loves to welcome like-minded & talented people to our tribe. We all share our passion for creating a world of holistic, certified-organic and non-toxic beauty. We love our job and we simply aim to be the best salon & spa in Denmark. We have won several awards on several occasions. We feel very proud about these achievements, as we perceive them as a great acknowledgement to our hard-work, dedication and willingness to make a difference.
Love. 
Stella & Beauty Avenue's Team

JobPositionInformation.PositionTitle: Award-winning salon & spa in Copenhagen is looking for 3 talented cosmeticians / beauticians / beauty therapists
JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
Join our amazing team of happy, dedicated and diverse beauty and wellness nerds at our beautiful salon & spa in Copenhagen, Denmark.

At Beauty Avenue we are passionate about our industry. Our career is our hobby and we thrive on becoming the best.

We take pride in the quality of service that our guests receive at our salon & spa - that is why we love to work with people who are service-minded at heart.

You are likely to be our new colleague if..
You are naturally happy, positive and full of energy. You are focused and service-minded. You love structures, procedures and systems. Yet you embrace change with open arms.

You speak English; Danish is a great plus but not a necessity.

You are educated as a beauty therapist, beautician or cosmetician, and have previously worked in a similar position. We do occasionally welcome exceptionally fresh and promising talented people. Skills can be taught; character and work ethics cannot.

About us
We work solely with organic products and perform all natural and sustainable treatments. At our salon & spa we also house our in-house Apothecary Lab, where we create our own natural and organic skincare products, which you will be working with performing treatments.

We are an international house with no less than 13 different nationalities among our 25 colleagues. 

We currently have 3 full-time positions available (37 hours per week). We work 5 days pr. week distributed Monday - Saturday. 

How to apply?
Send us an email to talent@beautyavenue.dk with the SUBJECT 'Beauty Therapist' with the following documents in PDF format: your CV, your answered questionnaire (it can be downloaded from beautyavenue.dk/jobs) and your recommendation letters.

Contact our Talent Recruiting Team by email, if you have any questions or would like to hear more about the position: talent@beautyavenue.dk.

Important
Due to the amount of applications we receive, we will only be able to consider the candidates that have sent all the required documents.
